buildCommand: NODE_AUTH_TOKEN= NPM_TOKEN= NPM_AUTH_TOKEN= NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG=/dev/null NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY=https://registry.npmjs.org/ NPM_CONFIG_ALWAYS_AUTH=false npm run build
installCommand: NODE_AUTH_TOKEN= NPM_TOKEN= NPM_AUTH_TOKEN= NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG=/dev/null NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY=https://registry.npmjs.org/ NPM_CONFIG_ALWAYS_AUTH=false npm ci --no-audit --no-fund
